# cmccloudv2_autoscaling_scale_in_policy (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# create scale in policy
resource "cmccloudv2_autoscaling_scale_in_policy" "scale_in_policy1" {  
    name         = "as_group1_scale_in_policy"
    scale_number = 1
    scale_type   = "CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY"         // CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY,EXACT_CAPACITY,CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY,CHANGE_IN_PERCENTAGE
    cooldown     = 100
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cooldown` (Number) Length in number of seconds before the actual deletion happens, This param buys an instance some time before deletion
- `name` (String) The name of the autoscaling scale in out policy
- `scale_number` (Number) The scale number of the autoscaling scale in out policy
- `scale_type` (String) One of follow values: CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY,EXACT_CAPACITY,CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY,CHANGE_IN_PERCENTAGE

### Optional

- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
